duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate steam and high-pressure hoses for equipment cleaning and sanitizing
Follow sanitation schedules and conduct routine cleaning of facility and production line
Disassemble and reassemble equipment as directed for cleaning
Use and document chemical use to stated concentrations for appropriate applications
Comply with safety policies and procedures in accordance with Company, Local, State, and Federal regulations
Comply with Good Manufacturing Practices (GMPs) for a food plant and all applicable regulatory, customer, and company requirements
Perform basic math and communicate well with others verbally
Work in a team environment and take direction from others
